<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Duplicate the Google Search Console connection through accounts"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/google-search-console/authorize/duplicate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Call this API to duplicate an existing google search console connection to another accounts.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"from_account_key":{"type":"string"},"to_account_keys":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["from_account_key","to_account_keys"],"title":"DuplicateAuthorizationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"description":"The connection has been duplicated"},"422":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"description":"The account keys are invalid"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
